name: School Cred (Ludum Dare 44)
description:
[Description will be updated later] Your life is currency: You're an high school student, and you have a crush on the most popular person of the highschool! In this RPG where the battles are dialogues, you have to become friend with students more popular than you to earn more and more reputation, untill you wan finally reach your crush!

A game made in roughly 48h by Tristan Ledieu (Design/Programmation) and Cassandre Harington (Art)
